title: Experienced eCom Ad Video Editor
job_overview:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Video Editor to join our direct-to-consumer eCommerce brand. The ideal candidate will have a passion for creating compelling and visually stunning video content, with a focus on creating ads for use on paid social media platforms.

**Please do not apply if you do not have experience creating eCommerce ads**
**A trial video will also be requested during the application process**

If you are interested, you must fill out the following form to apply and we will reach out to you: Upgrade to see actual info

If you message us and do not apply through the google form, your application will not be considered.

Requirements:

- Fast internet
- Ability to work during central time (USA)
- 3+ years of experience in video editing for eCommerce advertising, with a focus on social media platforms
- Expertise in Adobe Premiere, Capcut, or other relevant video editing software
- Strong understanding of video production and editing techniques, including color correction, audio editing, and visual effects
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment
- Strong portfolio showcasing previous work and examples of successful ad campaigns
- Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines
- Experience working with user-generated content (UGC) creators and incorporating their content into video ads is a plus
- Experience generating AI images on midjourney, DALLE, or any AI image generation tool
